steps.title: Preheat The Oven
steps.description: Preheat the oven to 350째F (175째C). Butter an 8x4-inch loaf pan.

steps.title: Mash The Bananas And Add The Butter
steps.description: Mash the bananas and add the melted butter. Stir until completely smooth.

steps.title: Mix In The Remaining Ingredients
steps.description: Mix the baking soda and salt. Stir in the sugar, beaten egg, and vanilla extract. Mix in the flour.

steps.title: Bake The Bread
steps.description: Pour the batter into your prepared loaf pan. Bake for 55 to 65 minutes at 350째F (175째C), or until a toothpick or wooden skewer inserted into the center comes out clean.

steps.title: Cool And Serve
steps.description: Remove the bread from the pan and let cool completely before slicing and serving. The bread will keep at room temperature for 4 days. For longer storage, refrigerate the loaf for up to 5 days, or freeze it.
